skins.shipDescription: Type A Mod. 2 cruiser submarine ¨C I-13.
skins.selfIntroduction: I'm I-13, formally known as the Type A Mod. 2 cruiser submarine model thirteen. Some people call me the fifth of the Type A model, but I was really just an upgraded model that could store Seirans. Sounds cool, doesn't it? Well, sadly, I didn't achieve much of note...
skins.acquisition: Hi, Commander. I'm the aviation submarine I-13. My hobbies include aircraft and gazing up at the sky! Also, this is my friend, my Seiran. I'm glad to meet you.
skins.login: Welcome back, Commander. The skies are ever blue!
skins.details: There's only so many things a regular submarine can do. To turn the war around, we need more wings in the air.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Don't get the wrong idea about me, Commander. I do love aircraft, but that doesn't mean I hate myself for being a submarine.
skins.secretaryIdle2: The sea is the color of the sky. And the sky is the same color as me!
skins.secretaryIdle3: There's the Type 97 and Type 99, the Suisei, Tenzan, Ryuusei, Saiun, and of course, my Seiran. I know everything there is to know about aircraft!
skins.secretaryTouch: I'm okay with lending you my Seiran, but it's veeeeery expensive! Break it, and I'll be really angry, okay?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Don't make me pepper you with my Seiran's machine guns.
